Name: Stratos
About the game: Ship builder - Expand your ship by constructing new rooms, building new sections and placing props. Trade – Barter with different merchants for a variety of goods. Resource gathering – Grow or harvest different resources to meet the needs of your ship and crew. Citizen management – Manage the well-being of your citizens to keep them happy and healthy. Combat – Build an army of heroes to attack different factions. Equip them with weapons, armour and skills.
Meta Title: Stratos: Jul 17, 2020, New State and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Stratos? Check out the release date (Jul 17, 2020), developer insights from New State, and a complete game summary.
